info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

delete.description: Deletes the specified Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkVirtualApplianceName
parameters.description: The name of Network Virtual Appliance.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

Location.description: The URL of the resource used to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

204.description: Request successful. Resource with the specified name does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the specified Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkVirtualApplianceName
parameters.description: The name of Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands referenced resources.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a Network Virtual Appliance resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: networkVirtualApplianceName
parameters.description: The name of Network Virtual Appliance being updated.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to Update Network Virtual Appliance Tags.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of Network Virtual Appliance updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates the specified Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkVirtualApplianceName
parameters.description: The name of Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update Network Virtual Appliance.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting Network Virtual Appliance resource.

201.description: Request received successfully. The operation returns the resulting Network Virtual Appliance resource.

Location.description: The URL of the resource used to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Restarts one or more VMs belonging to the specified Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkVirtualApplianceName
parameters.description: The name of Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: NetworkVirtualApplianceInstanceIds
parameters.description: Specifies a list of virtual machine instance IDs from the Network Virtual Appliance VM instances.

200.description: Request successful. The operation restarts one or more Network Virtual Appliance VM resources.

202.description: Request accepted. The operation restarts one or more Network Virtual Appliance VM resources.

Location.description: The URL of the resource used to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Network Virtual Appliances in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Success. The operation returns a list of Network Virtual Appliance resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all Network Virtual Appliances in a subscription.

200.description: Success. The operation returns a list of Network Virtual Appliance resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified site from a Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkVirtualApplianceName
parameters.description: The name of the Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: siteName
parameters.description: The name of the site.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: Request successful. Resource with the specified name does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the specified Virtual Appliance Site.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkVirtualApplianceName
parameters.description: The name of the Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: siteName
parameters.description: The name of the site.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a Network Virtual Appliance Site resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates the specified Network Virtual Appliance Site.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkVirtualApplianceName
parameters.description: The name of the Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: siteName
parameters.description: The name of the site.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update Network Virtual Appliance Site operation.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting Network Virtual Appliance Site resource.

201.description: Request received successfully. The operation returns the resulting Network Virtual Appliance Site resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Network Virtual Appliance Sites in a Network Virtual Appliance resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkVirtualApplianceName
parameters.description: The name of the Network Virtual Appliance.

200.description: Success. The operation returns a list of Network Virtual Appliance site resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all SKUs available for a virtual appliance.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the list of all virtual appliance skus.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Retrieves a single available sku for network virtual appliance.

parameters.name: skuName
parameters.description: Name of the Sku.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the requested NetworkVirtualAppliance sku information.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates the specified Network Virtual Appliance Inbound Security Rules.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkVirtualApplianceName
parameters.description: The name of the Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: ruleCollectionName
parameters.description: The name of security rule collection.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update Network Virtual Appliance Inbound Security Rules operation.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting Network Virtual Appliance Inbound Security Rules resource.

201.description: Request received successfully. The operation returns the resulting Network Virtual Appliance Inbound Security Rules resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Retrieves the available specified Network Virtual Appliance Inbound Security Rules Collection.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkVirtualApplianceName
parameters.description: The name of the Network Virtual Appliance.

parameters.name: ruleCollectionName
parameters.description: The name of security rule collection.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the requested Network Virtual Appliance Inbound Security Rules Collection resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

properties.description: Properties of the Network Virtual Appliance.

identity.description: The service principal that has read access to cloud-init and config blob.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

virtualHub.description: The Virtual Hub where Network Virtual Appliance is being deployed.

virtualApplianceAsn.description: VirtualAppliance ASN. Microsoft private, public and IANA reserved ASN are not supported.

virtualApplianceNics.description: List of Virtual Appliance Network Interfaces.

networkProfile.description: Network Profile containing configurations for Public and Private NIC.

additionalNics.description: Details required for Additional Network Interface.

internetIngressPublicIps.description: List of Resource Uri of Public IPs for Internet Ingress Scenario.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

deploymentType.description: The deployment type. PartnerManaged for the SaaS NVA

delegation.description: The delegation for the Virtual Appliance

partnerManagedResource.description: The delegation for the Virtual Appliance

nicType.description: NIC type - PublicNic, PrivateNic, or AdditionalNic.

instanceName.description: Instance on which nic is attached.

type.description: NIC type. This should be either PublicNic or PrivateNic.

VirtualApplianceNetworkInterfaceConfigur.description: Represents a single NIC configuration properties.

VirtualApplianceIPConfigurationPropertie.description: Represents a single IP configuration properties.

primary.description: Whether or not this is primary IP configuration of the NIC.

VirtualApplianceAdditionalNicProperties.title: Network Virtual Appliance Additional Nic Properties
VirtualApplianceAdditionalNicProperties.description: Network Virtual Appliance Additional NIC properties.

hasPublicIp.description: Flag (true or false) for Intent for Public Ip on additional nic

InternetIngressPublicIpsProperties.title: Internet Ingress Public Ip Properties
InternetIngressPublicIpsProperties.description: Resource Uri of Public Ip for Standard Load Balancer Frontend End.

properties.description: The properties of the Virtual Appliance Sites.

name.description: Name of the virtual appliance site.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

allow.description: Flag to control breakout of o365 allow category.

optimize.description: Flag to control breakout of o365 optimize category.

default.description: Flag to control breakout of o365 default category.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

availableScaleUnits.description: The list of scale units available.

NetworkVirtualApplianceSkuInstances.title: Network Virtual Appliance Sku Instances
NetworkVirtualApplianceSkuInstances.description: List of available Sku and instances.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results.

NetworkVirtualApplianceListResult.description: Response for ListNetworkVirtualAppliances API service call.

value.description: List of Network Virtual Appliance sites.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results.

NetworkVirtualApplianceSiteListResult.description: Response for ListNetworkVirtualApplianceSites API service call.

value.description: List of Network Virtual Appliance Skus that are available.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results.

NetworkVirtualApplianceSkuListResult.description: Response for ListNetworkVirtualApplianceSkus API service call.

properties.description: The properties of the Inbound Security Rules.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ruleType.description: Rule Type. This should be either AutoExpire or Permanent. Auto Expire Rule only creates NSG rules. Permanent Rule creates NSG rule and SLB LB Rule.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

InboundSecurityRuleProperties.description: Properties of the Inbound Security Rules resource.

protocol.description: Protocol. This should be either TCP or UDP.

sourceAddressPrefix.description: The CIDR or source IP range.

destinationPortRange.description: NVA port ranges to be opened up. One needs to provide specific ports.

destinationPortRanges.description: NVA port ranges to be opened up. One can provide a range of ports. Allowed port value between 0 and 65535.

appliesOn.description: Public IP name in case of Permanent Rule type & Interface Name in case of Auto Expire Rule type

InboundSecurityRules.description: Properties of the Inbound Security Rules resource.

serviceName.description: The service name to which the NVA is delegated.

internalLoadBalancerId.description: The partner managed ILB resource id

standardLoadBalancerId.description: The partner managed SLB resource id

PartnerManagedResourceProperties.description: Properties of the partner managed resource.

instanceIds.description: The network virtual appliance instance ids. Omitting the network virtual appliance instance ids will result in the operation being performed on all virtual machines belonging to the network virtual appliance.

NetworkVirtualApplianceInstanceIds.description: Specifies a list of virtual machine instance IDs from the Network Virtual Appliance VM instances.
